string.description: Content description of the increase volume button. It lets the user increase the volume of the current audio output of the watch. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: horologist_volume_screen_volume_up_content_description

string.description: Content description of the decrease volume button. It lets the user decrease the volume of the current audio output of the watch. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: horologist_volume_screen_volume_down_content_description

string.description: Content description of the current volume. It lets the user know what the current volume is, in percent. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: horologist_volume_screen_volume_percent

string.description: Content description used when the volume is set to zero, i.e. no sound is coming out. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: horologist_volume_screen_volume_zero

string.description: State description of device output chip. It lets the user know that this device is connected to the watch and what the current volume is. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: horologist_volume_screen_connected_state

string.description: State description of device output chip. It lets the user know that this device is not connected to the watch. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: horologist_volume_screen_not_connected_state

string.description: The description of the click action on the device output chip. It lets the user know the audio output can be changed by clicking on this chip. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: horologist_volume_screen_change_audio_output

string.description: Indicates that the current audio output is the watch speaker. Appears on the device output button chip. [CHAR LIMIT=20]
string.name: horologist_speaker_name

string.description: Indicates that the user has to select a device before playing music. Appears on the device output button chip. [CHAR LIMIT=20]
string.name: choose_device

string.description: Indicates there's nothing to output audio to, e.g. there's no speaker and no headphones connected at the moment. Appears on the device output button chip. [CHAR LIMIT=20]
string.name: horologist_output_none

string.description: Content description of the SetVolume button. It lets the user navigate to the screen to control the system volume. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: horologist_set_volume_content_description

string.description: Content description of the AudioOutput button. It lets the user navigate to the system bluetooth settings screen to connect to a headset. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: horologist_audio_output_content_description

string.description: Label that tells the user they are in the part of the app for changing output volume. [CHAR_LIMIT=20]
string.name: horologist_volume_screen_volume_label
